tools.name: list_folders
tools.description:
Lists all available Outlook mail folders.

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of folder names.

    Example:
        list_folders()

tools.name: list_recent_emails
tools.description:
Retrieves a list of email subject lines from a specified folder within a given number of days.

    Args:
        days: Number of days to look back for recent emails (must be non-negative).
        folder: Name of the folder to search in (optional; defaults to the inbox).

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of email subject lines.

    Example:
        list_recent_emails(days=7, folder="Inbox")

tools.name: search_emails
tools.description:
Searches for emails based on keywords or contact names within a specified time range and folder.

    Args:
        keyword: Keyword to search for in the email body or subject.
        contact: Contact name or email address to filter results.
        start_date: Start date for the search range (format: `YYYY-MM-DD`).
        end_date: End date for the search range (format: `YYYY-MM-DD`).
        folder: Name of the folder to search in (optional; defaults to the inbox).

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing a list of matching email subject lines.

    Example:
        search_emails(keyword="urgent", contact="john.doe@example.com", start_date="2023-01-01", end_date="2023-01-31", folder="Inbox")

tools.name: get_email_by_number
tools.description:
Retrieves detailed information (body and attachments) for a specific email from the last listed set of emails.

    Args:
        email_number: Index of the email in the last listed set of emails.

    Returns:
        A JSON-formatted string containing the email's body, subject, and attachment details.

    Example:
        get_email_by_number(email_number=5)

tools.name: reply_to_email_by_number
tools.description:
Sends a reply to a specific email from the last listed set of emails.

    Args:
        email_number: Index of the email in the last listed set of emails.
        reply_content: Content of the reply message.

    Returns:
        A string indicating success or failure of the operation.

    Example:
        reply_to_email_by_number(email_number=5, reply_content="Thank you for your email. I will review it shortly.")

tools.name: compose_email
tools.description:
Creates and sends a new email with specified recipients, subject, body, and optional attachments.

    Args:
        to: Comma-separated list of recipient email addresses.
        cc: Comma-separated list of CC recipient email addresses (optional).
        subject: Subject of the email.
        body: Body content of the email.
        attachments: List of file paths to attach (optional).

    Returns:
        A string indicating success or failure of the operation.

    Example:
        compose_email(
            to="recipient@example.com",
            cc="cc_recipient@example.com",
            subject="Meeting Reminder",
            body="Please remember to attend the meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.",
            attachments=["path/to/file1.pdf", "path/to/file2.docx"]
        )

验证同时使用关键词、联系人、时间范围和自定义文件夹的所有参数组合搜索是否正常。

search_emails.case_name: Search Emails With Invalid Folder Name
search_emails.purpose: 验证当提供无效文件夹名称时，工具是否能正确处理并返回错误信息。

search_emails.case_name: Search Emails With Future Start Date
search_emails.purpose: 验证当开始日期晚于结束日期时，工具是否能正确拒绝请求并返回错误。

search_emails.case_name: Search Emails With Special Characters In Keyword
search_emails.purpose: 验证包含特殊字符的搜索关键词是否能被正确处理。
验证所有参数为空时工具的行为是否符合预期（应返回错误或空结果）。

get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证 get_email_by_number 能够根据有效的邮件索引号成功获取指定邮件的详细内容（正文、主题和附件信息）。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Attempt To Retrieve Email With Negative Index
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当提供负数作为邮件索引时，工具是否能正确拒绝请求并返回错误信息。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Attempt To Retrieve Email With Nonexistent Index
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当提供的邮件索引超出当前列出的邮件范围时，工具是否能正确处理并返回错误。
验证当邮件索引为0时，工具能否正确返回列表中的第一封邮件。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email With Maximum Allowed Index
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当邮件索引等于当前邮件列表最大有效索引时，是否能正确检索到最后一封邮件。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email With Special Characters In Content
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当邮件正文中包含特殊字符或非ASCII字符时，get_email_by_number 是否能正确返回这些内容。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Attempt To Retrieve Email Without Listing First
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证在未调用 list_recent_emails 获取邮件列表的情况下直接调用 get_email_by_number 是否能正确检测上下文缺失并返回错误。

get_email_by_number.case_name: Retrieve Email With Attachments And Validate File Paths
get_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当邮件包含附件时，get_email_by_number 返回的附件路径是否符合测试环境中可用文件的实际路径格式。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Valid Email Index With Normal Content
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证 reply_to_email_by_number 能够成功回复指定索引的邮件，使用正常内容。

args.reply_content: Thank you for your email. I will review it shortly.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To First Email In List
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 email_number 为 0（即列表中第一封邮件）时是否能正确发送回复。

args.reply_content: This is a test reply to the first email in the list.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Last Email In List
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 email_number 为最后一个有效索引时是否能正确发送回复。

args.reply_content: This is a test reply to the last email in the list.

reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 reply_content 为空字符串时是否仍能成功发送邮件。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply With Special Characters In Content
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证 reply_content 参数可以包含特殊字符和多语言文本。

args.reply_content: 感谢您的来信！@#$_这是一封测试回复邮件。

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply With Invalid Email Number Type
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 email_number 不是整数时能否正确返回参数错误。

args.reply_content: This should fail due to invalid email number type.

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool reply_to_email_by_number: 1 validation error for reply_to_email_by_numberArguments
email_number
  Input should be a valid integer, unable to parse string as an integer [type=int_parsing, input_value='five', input_type=str]
    For further information visit https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.10/v/int_parsing

reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 email_number 为负值时是否能拒绝请求并返回错误。

args.reply_content: This should fail because index is out of range.

reply_to_email_by_number.case_name: Reply To Out Of Bounds Email Index
reply_to_email_by_number.purpose: 验证当 email_number 超出当前邮件列表范围时是否能正确处理。

args.reply_content: This should fail because index is out of bounds.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Required Parameters Only
compose_email.purpose: 验证仅使用必填参数发送邮件的基本功能是否正常工作。

args.subject: Test Email
args.body: This is a test email body.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With CC And Body
compose_email.purpose: 验证包含CC收件人和邮件正文的邮件是否能成功发送。

args.subject: Meeting Reminder
args.body: Please remember to attend the meeting tomorrow at 10 AM.

compose_email.purpose: 验证带有一个附件的邮件是否能正确创建并发送。
验证带有多个附件的邮件是否能正确创建并发送。

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Special Characters In Subject
compose_email.purpose: 验证邮件主题中包含特殊字符时是否仍能正确处理。

args.subject: 测试邮件主题!@#$%^&*()
args.body: This email has special characters in the subject line.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Empty To Field
compose_email.purpose: 验证当 'to' 字段为空时工具是否能正确拒绝请求并返回错误信息。

args.subject: Empty To Field Test
args.body: This should fail due to empty 'to' field.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Nonexistent File Attachment
compose_email.purpose: 验证尝试附加不存在的文件时是否能正确处理错误。

args.subject: Nonexistent Attachment Test
args.body: Trying to attach a file that does not exist.

compose_email.case_name: Send Email With Read-Only File Attachment
compose_email.purpose: 验证尝试附加只读文件时是否能正确处理。

args.subject: Read-Only File Attachment
args.body: Testing attachment of a read-only file.
